ActorFrame.InitCommand:
%function(self) self:removecommand('Init') -- `xero` is the only global variable written by this template -- Everything, including the modder's variables are stored in it xero = { MIRIN_VERSION = '$VERSION', foreground = self, dir = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetSongDir(), }
-- Needed by StepMania, in order to not kill lua mods early self:sleep(9e9)
-- Load all of the core .lua files -- The order DOES matter here: -- std.lua needs to be loaded first -- template.lua needs to be last loadfile(xero.dir..'template/std.lua')() loadfile(xero.dir..'template/sort.lua')() loadfile(xero.dir..'template/ease.lua')() loadfile(xero.dir..'template/template.lua')()
end
